page.title: 20THE PEOPLE INVOLVED
page.content: The work was done by the boys of Devonport High School for Boys. The ecology survey was done by A.Ford, M.Rayment, N.Major, C.Stone, These were also helped in the amenities survey and village survey by R.Hooper-Bennet, N.Daw, D.Boswarthick, S.Drewery, M.Bartlett, A.Guy, A.Carey, D.Jones, M.Jago. The following junior boys helped with village survey,the school survey and did the lion's share of the typing in of information:- P. Elford, K.Smith, N.Hammacott, T.Burt, S.Green. Walkhampton schoolchildren who helped with questionnaire sheets were:- C.Lord, C.Lee, P.Swinburne, L.Clarke, R.Francis, A.Brown, S.Palmer, S.Newcombe, H.Cotton, C.Hannaford, J.Crosbie, M.Penrose, L.Pascoe, S.Graham, R.Granville.
